job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Computer Vision)
job.description: Skills Required: Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Bioinformatics, Health Informatics, Biotechnology, Clinical Research or a related technical field or equivalent practical experience Hands-on experience in implementing machine learning techniques using Python, R etc. Computer Vision Expertise in analytical concepts such as - Regression, Clustering, Classification, Tree based models, and/or other machine learning techniques An understanding of Deep Learning techniques (CNNs, RNNs, GANs, Reinforcement Learning) A high-level understanding of automation on a cloud environment is a plus. Google Cloud and/or AWS experience preferred Working knowledge of healthcare industry and regulatory requirements (regulatory reporting and compliance, privacy and security) Great analytical and quantitative skills Ability to think creatively and work well both as an individual contributor and as part of teams across multiple locations Strong communication skills and the ability to simplify the complexity of various algorithms Demonstrated exceptional abilities in some areas of their life and will raise the effectiveness of your team. In short, we are looking for a “Difference Maker” Roles and Responsibilities: Be/Become a Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence expert and apply cutting edge research technologies to solve real world business problems Work with various client stakeholders understand and evaluate their business pain points and identify areas where data science and analytics can be the solution Develop high-level solution architectures and design ML/AI applications Work with data science and ML engineering teams to build, test, and assess models to predict and optimize business outcomes Work closely with delivery manager and team members, across multiple locations, to ensure seamless delivery and communication cadences Communicate complex concepts and insights in a clear and concise manner Maintain an entrepreneurial spirit as you learn new ways to solve problems
